pr_title: fix: Do not include null values in JWT payloads

timeline.message: do not include null values in JWT payloads

timeline.bodyText: Changes looks fine, but there's a lot of duplicated code in this test class. Could you refactor the obvious bits? Also, the other tests use a JWT parser to validate the payload rather than an object mapper. I prefer making this one uniform with the others so we know the payload conforms rather than what an object mapper produces.
timeline.author: childish-sambino

timeline.message: refactor some duplicate code, use jwt parser
